授業目的: This course targets to the students who wish to be an entrepreneur and would create a venture by themselves.  The students who would take over their parents’ business are also recommended to take this course.  The course therefore focuses on venture capitals, venture financing and financing at small to medium sized companies.
到達目標: The course aims to have students understand the fundamental concepts, theories, and practical skills of entrepreneurial finance as well as financing in small to medium sized corporations.
関連科目: Corporate Finance,  Principle of Finance,  Advanced Topic in Business H,  Financial Risk Management,  Capital Market,  Statistics
授業方法: We will have a face to face lecture. We use MS Excel for valuations.

第1回: Overview of Entrepreneurial finance and venture financing
第2回: Overview of Entrepreneurial finance and venture financing
第3回: Venture financing and Amazon.com case study
第4回: Venture financing and Amazon.com case study
第9回: Financial modeling and howe much cash needed ?
第10回: Financial modeling and howe much cash needed ?
第13回: Harvesting: how to exit the venture financing
第14回: Harvesting: how to exit the venture financing

教科書/Required texts0: Smith, J and R. Smith, 2019, "Entrepreneurial Finance:  Venture Capital, Deal Structure & Valuation, Second Edition," Stanford Business Book.
学生による授業評価の方法Course Evaluation by Student: Will be conducted after the course is over.
